{{short description|Valley in Rohan}}
[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Westfold Vale.jpg|thumb|250px|Westfold Vale in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
The '''Westfold Vale''' was a valley in the [[Westfold]] of [[Rohan]] through which ran the [[Deeping-stream]] out from the [[Deeping-coomb]]. It was also the home of [[Erkenbrand]].<ref>{{TT|III7}}</ref>

== Portrayal in adaptations ==
'''2013: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The Westfold Vale is located in the south of the [[Westfold]] area of the [[Westemnet]].
